Title: Relates to customers with documented need for essential electricity for medical needs
Summary: Provides that each electric corporation shall establish a unique priority phone number that shall remain in operation every day of the year for customers who have documented their need for essential electricity for medical needs; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง66, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to customers with documented need for essential electricity for medical needs
